name: Deducto 2
description:
Social Deduction: Discover the imposters hiding amongst your co-workers. Vote them out!




Customization: Cosmetics are unlockable through achievements and in-game progression!




New Daily Challenge: Compete daily with your friends on a new randomized course!



Additional Features:

  • Proximity voice chat
  • Vents, traps, and cameras
  • Unique workplace-themed roles
  • Interesting tasks, weapons, and items
  • Active and growing community
